title: Contracts
text:
Current Contracts
Coalition Labor Agreement
Local21HD Specific Agreement/Appendix
This contract began 01/01/2021 and will end 12/31/2024.

title: Home
text: Our contract(s) specify most our the rules related to our pay, benefits, and working conditions. Additional rights are enshrined by local, state, and federal law. Pay specific attention to Weingarten rights which is the right to union representation during certain types of meetings with management. If you are ever unsure about your rights, please let a member of the L21HD leadership team know.

title: Home
text:
About
Local 21HD is a union of epidemiologists, disease research investigation specialists, social research scientists, psychiatric evaluation specialists, and environmental scientists working at Public Health - Seattle & King County.
We are part of Council 2 of the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME)

Enroll now!

title: Home
text:
